name: Office Job
description:
Welcome to your new office job - you have made it. You are now a tax payer. Go and sort stuff into other stuff because someone else told you to do so!

Move the paddle forward(w), back(s), left(a), right(d), up(e) and down(q). Left click your mouse to hold and drop a ball. When you are over a color drop it into its colored zone.

Do this is from 8am to 5pm for the best years of your life.  Do this as long as your can until you quit!

I do hope you enjoy playing this little game. Feel free to visit the developers website at cupantaegames.com. Drop me a line at social@cupantaegames.com as I would love to hear from you.
